amendment.description: An amendment numbered 120 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to prohibit funds to carry out the provisions of section 50262 of Public Law 117- 169 (Inflation Reduction Act).
amendment.purpose: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to carry out the provisions of section 50262 of Public Law 117-169 (the Inflation Reduction Act), which modifies oil and gas royalty rates.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A070) Agreed to by recorded vote: 214 - 204 (Roll no. 593).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A070) Agreed to by recorded vote: 214 - 204 (Roll no. 593).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A070) Agreed to by recorded vote: 214 - 204 (Roll no. 593).
